m_szDocTitle: Honda FCV Concept: Hydrogen Fuel-Cell Vehicle Coming In 2016 (Live Photos)
m_szDocSumamry: Honda FCV Concept: Hydrogen Fuel-Cell Vehicle Coming In 2016 (Live Photos) Email This Page To (separate emails with commas) Message (optional) Your email was sent successfully. Close Stephen Edelstein 6,483 views Jan 14, 2015 We've now got live photos of the updated Honda FCV hydrogen fuel-cell concept, which made its North American debut at the 2015 Detroit Auto Show this week. A design evolution of 2013's FCEV concept, the Honda FCV was first unveiled at the Tokyo Motor Show back in November.
